title: Beach & lagoon Front Commercial Land For Immediate Sale
details:
Land is unpopulated, Nestled amongst a large lagoon and offers white sand beaches surrounded by crystal clear calm blue waters and lush tropical wilderness. Last property of this area of this size and the quality.

My Client owned the land for last 15 years. Clear Deeds.

Expecting 500,000/- Per Perch

Land Size - 471 Perches

Brokers also welcome.
